mapper.select: select distinct b_rank, a.title, a.author, a.description, a.pub_date from book_rank as a inner join public_library as b on a.isbn13 = b.isbn13 inner join new_book as c on a.isbn13 = c.isbn13 where b_rank ='1' order by b_rank asc
